bpp/descriptor.name: GlobalLinker Mall
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: GlobalLinker is a B2B networking and digitization enablement platform empowering micro and small businesses in creating their digital presence and growing digitally in the new normal.

descriptor.short_desc: Introducing our Hibiscus Pineapple Yellow Casual Pure Linen Full Shirt, a perfect blend of tropical beauty and sunny vibes. The pineapple yellow hue of the shirt instantly brightens up any look, while the intricate hibiscus print adds a touch of exotic charm. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this casual full shirt offers both comfort and style. descriptor.long_desc: Introducing our Hibiscus Pineapple Yellow Casual Pure Linen Full Shirt, a perfect blend of tropical beauty and sunny vibes. The pineapple yellow hue of the shirt instantly brightens up any look, while the intricate hibiscus print adds a touch of exotic charm. Whether you are heading to a beach vacation or simply want to embrace the tropical spirit, our Hibiscus Pineapple Yellow Casual Pure Linen Full Shirt is the ideal choice. Let the vibrant hibiscus flowers and sunny yellow color transport you to a tropical paradise. Elevate your style and radiate positive energy with this striking and fashionable piece.

descriptor.long_desc: Introducing our French Marigold Arctic Blue Casual Pure Linen Full Shirt, a captivating blend of floral beauty and serene elegance. descriptor.name: Tropical Maroon Leaves Banana Yellow Casual Pure Linen Full Shirt (Size - S) by Fashion@123
descriptor.short_desc: Make a vibrant statement with our Tropical Maroon Leaves Banana Yellow Casual Pure Linen Full Shirt. Featuring a striking maroon leaves print against a lively banana yellow background, this shirt exudes tropical flair. Crafted from premium quality linen, it offers both comfort and style, making it a must-have addition to your wardrobe.
descriptor.long_desc: Introducing our Tropical Maroon Leaves Print with Banana Yellow Casual Pure Linen Full Shirt, a vibrant and stylish addition to your wardrobe. The rich maroon leaves print pops against the bright and energetic banana yellow background, creating a captivating and tropical-inspired design. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this casual full shirt offers both comfort and style. The premium quality fabric ensures a soft and breathable feel against your skin, while the relaxed fit allows for easy movement. Whether you are strolling along the beach or attending a summer gathering, our Tropical Maroon Leaves Print with Banana Yellow Casual Pure Linen Full Shirt is the perfect choice. Embrace the beauty of tropical foliage and let the dynamic combination of maroon and banana yellow colors bring a sense of playfulness and warmth to your style. Stand out with confidence and elevate your fashion game with this eye-catching and fashionable piece. Additional Details: Color: Banana Yellow

This nature-inspired piece features a vibrant cobalt blue hue and intricate tropical leaf print, adding a touch of tropical paradise to your wardrobe. Crafted with premium quality linen, this shirt offers both comfort and style, making it perfect for any occasion.
descriptor.long_desc: Introducing our Tropical Leaves Cobalt Blue Casual Pure Linen Full Shirt, a stylish and nature-inspired addition to your wardrobe. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this casual full shirt offers both comfort and style.
